title: Monday Night Football Watch Parties with Ed Croke & ESPN 106.3 FM at iDeck
text:
Monday Night Football Watch Parties with Ed Croke & ESPN 106.3 FM at iDeck Where 
400 Avenue of the Champions West Palm Beach, FL 33418 Upcoming 
7:00 p.m. Monday, Oct. 26, 2015 Categories 
Sports, Football SPECIAL CELEBRITY GUEST, BRIAN LEE KELLEY APPEARS LIVE! Kick off Monday Night Football with Ed Croke, former Public Relations Director of the New York Giants for 28 years and ESPN 106.3FM. Monday nights will never be the same after you experience one of our No-Cover, No-Ticket-Required shows with tributes to your favorite legends from yesteryear live from the all new iDECK, located inside PGA National Resort & Spa. Watch football on big screen televisions, all with the best rooftop view in town. 5PM â€“ 8PM HAPPY HOUR iBAR SPECIALS FOR FANS: $3 Draft Beers $5 Premium Well Drinks $7 Sobieski Martinis $7 Glass of House Wine For Private Parties Call Our Private Dining & Special Events Manager At: 561 .624.8200. Special thanks to our sponsors: Braman Motor Cars & Sobieski Vodka
